name: MEC Voyager Sweater - Men's
description:
Blurring the line between your everyday fleece and your alpine layers. Made of soft recycled fleece, the Voyager Sweater is great pick for chilly days and any urban mission.Smooth brushed fleece layers well.Dual front zippered pockets.Elasticised piping at the cuffs, hem and collar.Panelled construction works with pack straps.Relaxed fit.

        Sustainability
